about_the_game: It is an action shooting game based on the SCP a view of the world with an ending that combines survival elements.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes Gore scenes of gun-induced death of enemy monsters, bleeding, fist-induced violence, and limb amputation by special bullets.

detailed_description: It is an action shooting game based on the SCP a view of the world with an ending that combines survival elements.
name: SCP : A Star Replicator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD 5600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 4060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD 5600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 4070Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 13 GB available space

short_description: A sphere that appears to be SCP appears on an island in the South Pacific and you should remove it. The foundation's treasurer fails to invest in coins and sources the equipment locally.
